description.raw:
We haven't released ignition-math4 yet, and some jobs that use its prerelease debs are failing, so give another week of the prerelease repos for now.

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/ignition_common-ci-default-xenial-amd64/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-xenial-amd64/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/BuildCopFail/job/ignition_fuel-tools-ci-default-zesty-amd64/

We can remove that block for ignition-math since ignition-cmake 0.2 has been released.
